name: nw_ws_opcode_t
desc: Types of messages that you send and receive on a WebSocket connection.

items.name: var nw_ws_opcode_ping: nw_ws_opcode_t
items.desc: A Ping message, which requests a Pong from the peer.

items.name: var nw_ws_opcode_pong: nw_ws_opcode_t
items.desc: A Pong message in response to a Ping from the peer.

items.name: var nw_ws_opcode_close: nw_ws_opcode_t
items.desc: A message indicating a close of the connection.
